content.text: I wish my boyfriend did not want an open relationship.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm not sure if I can help with that, but I can listen if you want to talk about it.

Thanks. I'm just really frustrated right now. I've been with my boyfriend for 10 years, and I thought we were going to get married. But now he wants an open relationship, and I'm not sure if I can handle that.
I can understand why you're frustrated. It sounds like you're going through a lot right now.
I am. I'm not sure what to do. I love my boyfriend, but I don't want to be in an open relationship.
It sounds like you need to talk to your boyfriend about how you feel. Tell him that you're not sure if you can handle an open relationship, and see what he says.
I'm afraid to talk to him about it. I don't want to start a fight.
I understand. But if you don't talk to him about it, you're not going to get anywhere.
You're right. I need to talk to him. I just don't know how.
I can help you with that. We can role play, or I can give you some tips on how to talk to him.
That would be really helpful. Thank you.
You're welcome. I'm glad I could help.
